properties.Observatio: The area where the springs are located and the catchpit are completely covered with grass. A water scheme using this spring is already underway. There are no boundaries are not marked. This area may be about  30 perches of which about 30% are large trees
properties.Descriptio:
Planting trees around the tank

Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m

properties.Observatio: The well is dug to a depth about and water is used. There are no boundaries. This area may be about  20 perches of which about 20% are large trees
properties.Descriptio:
Construction of the stock tank with cover nets

Construction of Concrete water storage tank of 20 cum - size internal 3mx3mx2.5

Fabricating & fixing security weld mesh in open-type buildings in GI weld mesh 50mm x 50mm SWG 10, welded on 40mm x 40mm x 5m
